Step-by-Step Guide: Building an Authoritative Source from CSV in SailPoint IIQ

ðŸ“˜ Purpose of This Document

This document provides a complete, beginner-friendly, step-by-step guide for creating an
Authoritative Source Application in SailPoint IdentityIQ using a CSV (Delimited File).

It explains:

  • What each IAM and SailPoint term means
  • Why each configuration step is required
  • How to build the HR Employees authoritative application correctly
  • How schema discovery works
  • How IdentityIQ converts CSV rows into managed identities
  • How to preview, test, and validate the setup
  • A final cheat sheet summarizing all required values

By the end, you will fully understand how IdentityIQ ingests employee data from a CSV file,
how it becomes an authoritative identity source, and how this powers Identity Lifecycle,
Manager relationships, Certifications, and all downstream governance functions.
